title: Yap Lim
description: 叶林素食餐厅 restaurant has A/C. Serves rice and noodle with a variety of buffet dishes made of vegetables, tofu, and mock meat. The cooked food is vegan except for the banana cakes (egg). It is also a food store selling an extensive choice of frozen mock 000meats and other food, prepackaged health food (some of which do contain milk products), supplements, drinks, etc.
